quotes.quote: Gratitude turns what we have into enough.
Start each day with a grateful heart.
Gratitude is the best attitude.
Count your blessings, not your problems.
Give thanks for a little, and you will find a lot.
Gratitude is the wine for the soul. Go on. Get drunk.
Gratitude changes everything.
The heart that gives thanks is a happy heart.
A grateful mind is a great mind.
Happiness is a grateful heart.
Gratitude unlocks the fullness of life.
Thankful people are happy people.
Gratitude brings peace for today.
The more grateful I am, the more beauty I see.
There is always something to be thankful for.
Every day is a new blessing.
Gratitude is a magnet for miracles.
Be thankful for the small things.
Gratitude is the key to happiness.
Joy comes from a thankful heart.
